Straight Shot looks to Airhammer and the others with a confident serenity.=


" Master Yokitron trained my brother and Nightshift to always keep their =
minds clear during confrontations to  enhance performance  and guard agains=
t psychological infiltration. Tucson has always kept the words of his Sensa=
i  and maybe that will stop him from being brainwashed.  Rodimus never paid=
 that much attention to Yokitron's training but Tucson did.  He clears his =
mind constantly during combat and an empty mind is one that has nothing to =
steal from."

Rattrap raises a brow.

" So that's why Wings was able ta kee=
p his sanity in check. Wow. Talk about being well trained." 

Straight shot=
 looks to Leo Prime.

" Tucson meant to attempt to train Rodimus the same w=
ay Master Yokitron taught him, but it might be too late for that.  It might=
 be too late."
